OOC: I'm really bored, so I wrote this. I need Zeni injured for story
purposes, so here I go!

BIC: Technosis: Your mad.

Deemos: Maybe, but I'm smart. Yo, Rizopas, make yourself useful and grab the
kid. And troops, aim the guns at the rest.

Zeni backed away from Deemos. Rizopas ran out, and reached out and grabbed
him. Zeni struggled to get free, but then held his hands together and then
fired a beam of energy that blew Rizopas' head off. Rizopas' head rolled to
Doom Ice's feet, all of this happening in a few seconds. Zeni drops from
Rizopas' arms. Deemos ran and swung out with a punch and sends Zeni flying
into a large rock as he jumped down out of Rizopas' grip. He fell to the
ground, unconcious. There was a crack on the rock. Gramps is horrified and
trembles with fear. Technosis runs to Zeni.

Technosis: This is all my fault, all my fault.

Deemos: You and me, Aerotaur, one on one, what do you think about it? It'll
be a fair fight, just one on one, fight me, you win and I'll leave along
with my group, here. Mafia, watch the old man.

Deemos stands waiting for Aerotaur to respond.
